notifyMsg: Login expired, you can cancel to stay on this page, or log in again

introduction.description1: Morning Glory is a platform that enhances the connection between agents and their customers. Customers enter the system through the invitation of their agents, and they can complete some small tasks related to health together with the agents in the system. After completing certain tasks, they will receive corresponding rewards. At the same time, users are encouraged to develop healthier habits.
introduction.description2: The following is an introduction to the main functions of the product.
introduction.introductionContent1: The agent invites his/her customers by name and mobile phone number.
introduction.introductionContent2: Customer verification mobile phone number login.
introduction.introductionContent3: After logging in, the user can complete some health tasks.
introduction.introductionContent4: Customer can get corresponding rewards after completion task.

introduce.welcomeMemo1: Here you can earn your rewards by

introduce.titleMemo2: We sent it to the number

TeamAcceptChallenge.rule: Every day at least 60% of the members complete the team’s task, the day’s goal is achieved During the event period, there are at least 60% of the days to achieve the daily goal, then the team challenge is successful, and each team member will receive a prize
